page.title: 09 BACKWORTH COMMUNITY ROOM.
page.content: The Community Room was set up in one of the mobile classrooms which became vacant when the extensions to the First School were completed. The room is available to any local group. At present the Community Room supports a pre-school playgroup which was set up and is run by parents. The parents of the nursery children use it occasionly to hold fund-raising events. The local Health Authority hold monthly meetings for district nurses there.A fortnightly baby clinic is also held there.
